title: Join the Sentances!!!
content:
---------
Rules:

1) No chatting etc.
2) Only one normally structured sentance per reply
3) Only reply if the last three sentances are not yours

So lets get started: Note that this can have to do with anything including keen (may as well include him in this somehow [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ).
---------


Once apon a time there was a boy named Billy.

title: Re: Join the Sentances!!!
content:
His full name was Billiam Martin Xavier Verdant III and he had absolutely nothing to do with the following events.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Nice, let's write a book while we are at it.
content:
The events, eventful as they were, happened in the ancient past.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
